definition: the discipline that records and interprets past events involving human beings
details:
noun
- the discipline that records and interprets past events involving human beings
= example: the discipline that records and interprets past events involving human beings
- all that is remembered of the past as preserved in writing
- a record or narrative description of past events
= example: a record or narrative description of past events
= synonyms: account
- the aggregate of past events
= example: the aggregate of past events
- the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present and even into the future
= example: the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present and even into the future
